shortdesc.ph: Used to configure audio parameters for screen sharing stream.
Configures audio parameters for screen sharing stream.

section.p: Available only when captureAudio is set to .
Takes effect only when captureAudio is set to .

plentry.pd: Number of audio channels. The default value is 2, which means stereo.
Captured system audio volume. Value range is [0, 100], default is 100.
Number of audio channels. Default is 2 (stereo).
Volume of captured system audio. Range: [0, 100]. Default is 100.

pd.note: This parameter only controls whether to capture audio from the current app. It does not control whether the captured audio is published to the channel. You need to configure it via the options parameter when calling joinChannel or .
pd.ph: Whether to capture audio from the current app:

ul.li: : (Default) Capture audio from the current app.
: Do not capture audio from the current app.
